select rst.studioId, rst.memberCount, (rst.courseCount1 + rst.courseCount2) as courseCount, rst.consultCount, rst.liveCount from ( select -- 工作室成员数量 ( select IFNULL(count(1), 0) + 1 from jxb.counselor c, jxb.teacher_audit ta WHERE c.id = ta.counselorId and ta.rst = '1' and c.studioId = studio.id ) as memberCount, -- 工作室主人课程数 - 1 ( select count(1) from jxb.course c left JOIN jxb.course_audit ca on ca.courseId = c.id where ca.rst='1' and c.createUserId = studio.counselorId ) as courseCount1, -- 工作室成员课程数 - 2 ( select count(1) from jxb.course c left JOIN jxb.course_audit ca on ca.courseId = c.id where ca.rst='1' and c.createUserId in ( select s.id from jxb.counselor c left join jxb.teacher_audit ta on c.id=ta.id left join jxb.studio s on c.studioId = s.id where ta.rst ='1' ) ) as courseCount2, -- 工作室咨询数 ( select count(1) from jxb.base_order t left join jxb.counselor c on t.businessId = c.id where t.category = '1' and t.payStatus in ( '2', '6', '7') and c.studioId = studio.id ) as consultCount, -- 直播数 0 as liveCount, studio.id as studioId from jxb.studio studio left join jxb.counselor c on studio.counselorId = c.id where studio.`status`='1' ) rst where rst.studioId = #{studioId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
